databaseModule

Class DirTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • databaseModule.DirTree

  • public class DirTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a basic directory structure as a tree.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sumeet Bansal

      • insert

        public void insert(java.lang.String path)
            throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Inserts DirNode into the tree recursively.
        Parameters:
        path - the new path being inserted
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null

      • hasKey

        public boolean hasKey(java.lang.String path)
               throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Determines if a certain path is in the tree.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the DirNode to be found
        Returns:
        true if DirNode found, else false
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null

      • getChildren

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getChildren(java.lang.String path)
                                            throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the children of the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the DirNode
        Returns:
        the children of the given DirNode
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path does not exist

      • findNode

        private DirTree.DirNode findNode(DirTree.DirNode curNode,
                                 java.lang.String path)
        Helper method that finds a specific DirNode recursively.
        Parameters:
        curNode - the current DirNode being checked
        path - the path of the DirNode to be found
        Returns:
        the specified DirNode, or null

      • add

        private void add(DirTree.DirNode curNode,
                 java.lang.String path)
        Helper method that adds a DirNode to the tree recursively.
        Parameters:
        curNode - the current DirNode being checked
        path - the path of the DirNode to be added

      • print

        public void print(java.lang.String path,
                  int level)
        Prints a branch of the tree.
        Parameters:
        path - the DirNode whose branch is being printed
        level - the number of levels to traverse

      • prnt

        private void prnt(DirTree.DirNode node,
                  java.lang.String buffer,
                  int level)
        Private helper method for in-order traversal.
        Parameters:
        node - the current DirNode
        buffer - the String buffer (used to indicate levels)
        level - the number of levels to traverse

      • countNodes

        public int countNodes(DirTree.DirNode node,
                      int level)
        Counts the number of nodes at a certain depth (useful for checking how many nodes/files/etc. are currently in the database).
        Parameters:
        node - the current dirNode in the traversal
        level - the number of levels remaining to traverse through
        Returns:
        the number of nodes at a certain depth
